plot: Choi, a sailor, stops at port for a night and spends time with Jeon Ok who falls in love with him. He then returns to the sea, promising that he will contact her but, when she gets no word from him, Jeon sets out on her own to find him
title: Hanggui ilya
plot_es: Choi, a sailor, stops at port for a night and spends time with Jeon Ok who falls in love with him. He then returns to the sea, promising that he will contact her but, when she gets no word from him, Jeon sets out on her own to find him
plot_en: Choi, a sailor, stops at port for a night and spends time with Jeon Ok who falls in love with him. He then returns to the sea, promising that he will contact her but, when she gets no word from him, Jeon sets out on her own to find him
